typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> salesRaw
source(output(
		{Entry No_} as integer,
		item_no as string,
		item_ref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> referenceItem
salesRaw, referenceItem lookup(salesRaw@item_no == referenceItem@item_no,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(equals(salesRaw@item_no,referenceItem@item_no),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ismatch, nomatch)
ConditionalSplit1@ismatch sink(input(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkmatch
ConditionalSplit1@nomatch sink(input(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinknomatch
